price: No he destruido ninguna ciudad sin antes haberle enviado a quien les advirtiera
arabic: وَمَآ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مِن قَرۡيَةٍ إِلَّا لَهَا مُنذِرُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: wamā ahlaknā min qaryatin illā lahā mundhirūna
